description: FIGURES 156–171. Calapnita magaseng sp. nov. (156–163; ZFMK, Ar 16027) and C. dayak sp. nov. (164–171; ♂: RMNH, ARA 17421; ♀: RMNH, ARA 17424, 17427). 156–157, 164–165. Left procursi, prolateral and retrolateral views. 158, 166. Left palpal femora, prolateral views. 159, 167. Left palpal trochanters, retrolateral views. 160–161, 168–169. Right male chelicerae, frontal and lateral views. 162, 170. Epigyna, ventral views. 163, 171. Cleared female genitalia, dorsal views. Scale lines: 0.3 mm.
name: FIGURES 156–171 in Revision and cladistic analysis of the Southeast Asian leaf-dwelling spider genus Calapnita Simon (Araneae, Pholcidae)
